titles.title: A bill to remove the right of reversion to the United States in lands owned by the Shriners' Hospitals for Crippled Children on lands formerly owned by the United States in Salt Lake County, Utah.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from GSA, OMB.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources received executive comment from General Services Administration. Unfavorable.
Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks. Hearings held.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources received executive comment from OMB. Unfavorable.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 100-242.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 471.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.
Referred to Subcommittee on Government Activities and Transportation.
Subcommittee Hearings Held.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee (Amended).
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Reported to House (Amended) by House Committee on Government Operations. Report No: 100-754.
Placed on Private Calendar No: 56.
Called up by House on Call of Private Calendar.

vote.text: Passed House (Amended) by Yea-Nay Vote: 365 - 0 (Record Vote No: 250).

action.text: Message on House action received in Senate and held at desk: House amendment to Senate bill.

vote.text: Senate agreed to the House amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Measure Signed in Senate.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 3/31/1987--Introduced. Removes the U.S. right of reversion in specified former Federal lands in Salt Lake County, Utah, now owned by a certain children's charity.
